Reviews.Content: We stayed 2 nights and wasn't expecting too much from a budget hotel so weren't disappointed. The room was very clean - bathroom was a bit odd, the shower isn't sectioned off ie, no shower curtins/screens and its right next to the toliet so the water from the shower pretty much hits the toilet. Close to Novena (can catch a bus there) - where there is a train station.

Reviews.Title: “Very small!”
Reviews.Author: Aussie_girl000
Reviews.Content: This hotel was too small for my liking. The bathroom was TINY and everything got wet when you showered. If you are on a budget then, this might work for you. It is very clean. But if you can afford a little bit more, find something else. Service - unfriendly staff - no smiles - no extra help. Pool - nice enough - closes at 7pm The room has thin walls so you can hear what goes on in the next room. Far from the city but taxi is cheap $8 approx to the city. If you are a solo traveller, this might be ok for you, but i find it too small for 2 people.

Reviews.Title: “Far but great shower, clean room!”
Reviews.Author: angelous_19
Reviews.Content: I stayed on december 11th to december 13th n took the triple room. The room was small but very very neat, clean n cool. I really really love the bathroom. Quite wide for a small room n very very clean with white colors. The hot shower worked out fine and have a strong water. They always replenish the used toolbath and towels. The room always tidy evrytime we came back. The aircon was great. No noisy stuff, no bad smell. They don't have much tv programmes thou but that's not a prob. They have swimming pool n gym but we didn't use it. There's a but thou. The staff r don't have much smile, and the bellboy didn't help us with the luggage. The hotel is quite bit far from the nearest MRT novena station. So its quite a walk, abit tiring for the old ones. The internet also abit expensive. They have seven eleven near the hotel, also a lot of restaurant. But hard to find the halal one if u're a moslem. But overall, I really love the hotel (minus the staff). Maybe becuz its a new hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Overall, a good hotel”
Reviews.Author: KittensOfFez
Reviews.Content: Overall the Value Thomson is a good hotel. The building in new, and as a result everything is clean and sparkling. The rooms are small, but well designed, though the bathrooms are particularly small. It is only a 5-10 minute walk from the hotel to the Novena MRT station (above which there is a shopping center with plenty of eating options), which makes the hotel well located. Just a few considerations. It cost US$1 to make a call from the room phone, even to a freecall number, and considering the cost of the room this seemed unreasonable. Laundry is very expensive (in the hotel, and in Singapore in general), and things took a significant amount of time to dry in the room. The internet access is the foyer is $4/half-hour, but across the road there is an internet cafe allowing access for $1/hour. And lastly, we were mischarged for the room to begin with, and were told by a mysterious phone called that we owed money. It took a number of puzzled looking staff to figure out what had gone wrong.

Reviews.Title: “Not good enough”
Reviews.Author: Niourk
Reviews.Content: Overall, the design of the hotel and the rooms are nice, but when it comes to staying there, i wouldn't recommend it. The room is extremely small (no night table, not a single shelf, 1m² bathroom, etc.) and extremelly noisy (roaring lamps and no isolation at all with the corridor, which is busy all night). During our stay, we were woken up 4 times by screaming chineese in the corridor. The personnel is neither friendly, nore helpfull. They just follow procedures. If you're out of it... to bad for you.

Reviews.Title: “clean and nice place, good value for money”
Reviews.Author: divIndonesia
Reviews.Content: it is not difficult to locate this hotel. just take MRT to NOVENA station, then you can take a bus for 1S$, or taxi for about 6 S$. the hotel is really clean with comfortable bed. bath room is a bit small, but it is OK. there is small restaurant and 7eleven shop nearby and bus stop is just across the street. need to pay 7S$ per person for breakfast. 10-15 minutes to orchard road by bus.

Reviews.Title: “Good value, nice and clean!”
Reviews.Author: Stacey H
Reviews.Content: This hotel is nice and clean, and has a cheap restaraunt with yummy food downstairs. The rooms are small but comfortable, although a mini fridge would have been handy. The bathroom is VERY small and the showers have no screen so the toilet and everything gets wet. But for the price and the cleanliness it is very good! The gym is not really a gym, its a treadmill (that I couldn't get to work) a fit ball, and an excersize bike, but at least its something! The pool and area is very nice and has a shower to rinse chlorine off. Staff were friendly and the MRT station is about 10 - 15 min walk away. For those who havent been to Singapore, catch an MRT to Orchard Rd and get off there. Find the Hippo Tours and get a ticket. We only had 2 days in Singapore and the Hippo tours was the best $23 ever spent. They take you to the best spots in the city and you can hop on and off where you like. Also includes a cruise section too! What a beautiful city, make sure you see the sights!

Reviews.Title: “Pleasantly surprised”
Reviews.Author: dearsweetangel
Reviews.Content: Me and my boyfriend went to SG last Nov9-12,2009. It's our first time in SG and we're on a budget trip. I want us to have a nice budgeted accommodation so I spent weeks looking for hotel promos and their reviews. By the time we had the money to book a hotel, most hotels are already fully booked bec. of the APEC summit, others are really expensive. So we just decided to book at Value Hotel Thomson. I'm very hesitant at first bec. of the size of the room and bathroom. I even emailed them to get the size of the rooms. I tried to book to a deluxe room which is a little bigger but unfortunately, it's also not available. I become more hesitant but since we're running out of time, we decided to book a superior room, and I'm glad we did! Right after we got off the taxi, one of the staff helped us removed our luggage from the taxi. We checked in 4 hrs earlier than the check in time but we didn't get any charge for it. We just paid the late check-out dues.10sgd /hr. Check in is smooth, it only took us around 10min. When we went to our room, I was surprised! It's not as small as I thought. I just found out they have 4 types of rooms - standard, superior,deluxe and triple. Maybe that's the reason why it's a little bigger. I told the staff before we go to our rooms to inform us if there'll be deluxe rooms available so we can upgrade. But when we saw the room, we decided not to. The room is just enough for us. We're not goin' to spend the whole day there anyway. The bathroom however is small but is tolerable. About the noise, you can hear it if your roommates if they're banging the doors of course. but during our stay, we didn't have any problems with that. They have a restaurant named 2nd kitchen and just like their website advertised, you can have a hearty buffet breakfast at SGD7/person. They have some variations everyday so that's good. The staff there are very friendly and helpful. One of them really took the effort to try to speak tagalog (philippine native language) and we're entertained. The hotel has a nice pool and a 2 gym facilities. There's free drinking water and coffee in the room and is being replenished everyday. Internet is SGD 10/day or you can use the 2 workstations on the groundfloor for sgd 4. There’s a comp shop across the road which is only SGD1/hr. If you really need to go the the internet, you can try it. The location is 10-15 min walk to novena station. there's also bus stop 5 min walk from the hotel. Over-all we enjoyed our stay at this hotel and I highly recommend it to those who wants to have a nice, clean, comfortable and budgeted stay in singapore. We're happy with our stay so we tooks some time to give credit to the hotel. I recommend this hotel but the decision is still up to you. We have our own tastes anyway when it comes to accommodation. What's important is you get to enjoy your vacation. I attach photos here to help you decide.

Reviews.Title: “Staff very unhelpful”
Reviews.Author: johnDorsetEngland
Reviews.Content: We have been travailing for the last 8 months and have just spent 2 months in Indonesia Staying at all types of accommodation It was with delight that we found The Value hotel and we were thrilled with the facilities Lovely pool Beautifully clean rooms , small but very comfortable . The only down side to this new hotel is the Attitude of the staff I would go as far as to say We found them rude and for this reason alone We will not return here when you can have the same standard of hotel for the same price and have a happy pleasant greeting..... Remember manners and a smile cost nothing but they go a long way especially in the service industry . If you do stay here then the only redeeming feature is that if you walk along Balestire Road for 10 minutes you will come across the Tandoori Corner North Indian Curry House on the left hand side . This place is so worth the walk and you should try the Tandoori Lamb Chops or the Black Lentils The Guys that run this restaurant are almost as good as their food.Being lovers of Indian Cuisine we can not recommend this restaurant enough. This place beats any place in Little India and is not designed for tourists you may only see locals eating here . Try the Elizabeth hotel 5 minute walk from Orchard road with all its shopping centers , food courts, cinemas and still the hotel is quiet . it is part of the far east hotels www.fareasthotels.com.sg this hotel has a fab pool the staff are all friendly and the rooms are a good size , we stayed on the 12th floor . Check the rates on trip advisor it is not much more than the value Hotel and we would return here .

Reviews.Title: “My mornings and nights at Value Hotel Thomson”
Reviews.Author: WeeTurtle
Reviews.Content: My stay at the Hotel Thomson was a pleasant one. The service at the hotel was very good. Extra pillows were brought up shortly after they were requested. Water bottles are restocked each day. They are a must have in the city state of Singapore. The hotel room was small but acceptable. There was no room to put away your clothes. You live out of the suitcase. One downside of the room is that the walls do not block out the outside sounds well. It was easy to hear others outside the room. The room had a large bed. It was big enough for two people to sleep comfortably. The air conditioner worked very well the entire visit. The shower and toilet were in the same space. If you come with a partner, you cannot use both at the same time. The toilet gets wet when the shower is being used. There was a flat panel TV and a DVD player present for your enjoyment. Their pool was nice. It was a decent size and depth. There was more than enough room to swim a few laps. The exercise room was very small. It was situated next to the pool. The hotel was situated very close to the bus stops. A bus stop is only a minutes walk from the hotel. The MRT was only a few bus stops away from the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “The best budget hotel in Singapore”
Reviews.Author: fishynomad
Reviews.Content: I arrived in Changi Airport and took the MRT to Novena station (SGD2.80). At Novena station, head out towards Novena Square exit and turn right, walk up Thomson road for 10 minutes, and the Value Thomson Hotel is situated just behind Balestier Shopping Complex (opposite on Balestier Road). Check-in was a breeze, even though they said I only booked 1 night, but I actually booked 2 nights. The problem was sorted quickly and efficiently. My room was what I expected, a double bed with clean sheets and comfortable. Good air-conditioning control. Tea and coffee to hand with kettle and a good sized LCD flat screen. Only 4 English channels, (HBO, ESPN, Football channel, News channel). Also a hair-dryer. There is a built-in shelf that runs across the entire window, which you can put your luggage, with a wardrobe with 5 hangers. The bathroom (wet room) is a good size, sink, toilet, and hot shower. There is one problem (there always is for this price) the noise from the other room seems to travel through the above air-conditioning vent. My neighbours were quiet, so I was lucky. I didn't use the pool on level 7, so I have no comment. Just by the lifts is a internet section with 3 terminals, not sure whether they are free to use. There is a restuarant just outside which served western and local. Chinese restuarants are within walking distance all around the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Has to be one of the better budget hotels in Singapore!”
Reviews.Author: ausooi
Reviews.Content: Was only in Singapore for couple of nights and was looking for a budget place. Almost decided to book Fragrance agan until Sg friend recommended this one. So gave it a go. Totally agreed with one of the previous reviews - This hotel is much better than and Fragrance (and most likely Hotel 81). This place was much better in every sense. Newer, location-wise, bit more spacious, larger TV and quieter. The bathroom is still small (when shower, expect most things to get wet), but its larger than the other budget hotel that I stayed with before. Not much space if you have 2 (or more) large suitcases (ie. family) The location is also very good. Just outside the have lots of hawker food stalls (the restaurant food did look decent, but walk across the road is much cheaper local food stuff) , cheap net cafe nearby (SG$1 / hr - avoid using hotel net service if possible), and abut 150m walk to a bus-stop that will take you directly to heart of Orchard Road in about 10-15 mins bus-ride. No problems with the staffs. Hint: I requested for non-smoking and mid-rise room thanks to previous comments. It was quiet! But I sincerely believed a bit of luck sometimes. Overall, I highly recommend this place to singles (or couples) who are looking for a neat, compact, budget type place to live in Singapore! For family type it still ok, but will be cramped. Will definiltey stay there again!

Reviews.Title: “Great value for Singapore”
Reviews.Author: craig2007
Reviews.Content: A rarity in Singapore - a hotel with pool for less than USD70/night. Compact rooms, 4 efficient lifts, very clean and only newly opened. Located away from MRT but good bus links to other parts of Singapore. Only 10 minutes walk to MRT Novena with attached shopping complex. Decent hotel restaurant although breakfast is a bit light on. Internet connection available in room for SGD10/day.

Reviews.Title: “I'd stay here over any 81 or Fragrance branches”
Reviews.Author: seven_roachies
Reviews.Content: My room was small, with just 2 single beds, a dresser, a plasma TV and a cubicle sized bathroom with a shower. But at least it was clean, well-lit, tastefully decorated - AND it came with a window, a bonus if compared to sister branches Balestier and Nice, which charges extra for a room with a view. The location is superb for the price I paid (S$ 79),:2 bus stops away from a train station (Novena) or just 7 minutes by cab to Orchard Road. My only complaint is that the walls are thin - I could hear my neighbour's TV and people chatting outside very clearly; especially housekeeping. I didn't get to check out the pool and the gym, or try the $7 breakfast, but I'll definitely come back as long as the hotel maintains its rates, cleanliness and facilities.
